titleStmt.title: A Christian discourse vpon certaine poynts of religion Presented vnto the most high & puissant Lorde, the Prince of Conde. Translated out of French into English by Iohn Brooke of Ashe next Sandwich. 1578.
titleStmt.author: Brooke, John, d. 1582.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
